heroSubtitle.goal: I strive to build interfaces that are enjoyable to use.

aboutTitle: Hi, I'm Sofiia. Nice to meet you!
aboutText1: Frontend developer with commercial experience. Worked on a WordPress site for a private kindergarten.
aboutText2: Specialized in developing SPA applications with React. Experienced in hooks, Context API, responsive layout, SCSS, and API integration.
aboutText3: I’m detail-oriented, always learning, and open to new challenges and collaborations. Let’s build something great together!
project1Desc: Responsive single-page application for pizza ordering. Includes routing, filtering, Redux cart logic, and localStorage persistence.
project2Desc: Responsive commercial WordPress site for a private kindergarten. Features custom theme, user-friendly admin panel, and SEO optimization.
project3Desc: Movie search app using a public REST API with a responsive and user-friendly interface.
project4Desc: Dynamic game with object interaction logic implemented in pure JavaScript.
project5Desc: User management web application integrated with an API, built using Vue.js.
project6Desc: Backend with authorization, request handling, and database operations using Node.js.
name: © 2025 Sofiia Mizina
